snippet: A jury in El Cajon convicted an Iraqi immigrant on Thursday of bludgeoning his wife to death in a case that was initially considered a hate crime.
abstract: Jury in El Cajon, Calif, convicts Iraqi immigrant Kassim Alhimidi of bludgeoning his wife Shaima Alawadi to death in case that was initially considered a hate crime.
lead_paragraph: A jury in El Cajon convicted an Iraqi immigrant on Thursday of bludgeoning his wife to death in a case that was initially considered a hate crime.

headline.main: California: Spouse Convicted in Killing Once Thought to Be a Hate Crime
headline.print_headline: California: Spouse Convicted in Killing Once Thought to Be a Hate Crime
